channel.title: How Do I change the Ip from 127.0.0.1 on pvp scape?
channel.description: I just want to start my own server on PVPscape and whenever I want to log on i have to use 127.0.0.1. Id like to make it like: shownomercy.no-ip.org. Ive downloaded no-ip at the website, registered and added a host. What do I do from here. Answer in simpelest ways Possible :) ;)

item.title: How Do I change the Ip from 127.0.0.1 on pvp scape?

item.description:
@Bigsyboy wrote:

well can you help me for half an hour please? Ive been tryin forreeeeeeeeeeeever to make a server…please man?

item.title: How Do I change the Ip from 127.0.0.1 on pvp scape?
item.dc:creator: @Halo4Ever Halo4Ever
item.description:
@Halo4Ever wrote:

Basically, all you need to do is find a tutorial online to setting port allowances, so you can set the moparscape port which is 43954 or what ever it is to have full access to your internet so it will allow people to connect to your server, you might find good tutorials in the tutorial section, or by using the search tool.

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I change the Ip from 127.0.0.1 on pvp scape?
item.dc:creator: @Halo4Ever Halo4Ever
item.description:
@Halo4Ever wrote:

Also setting your Router is going to be different depending on the router you have, you’ll have to gain Admin access on your router and allow all port connections for Moparscape.

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I change the Ip from 127.0.0.1 on pvp scape?
item.dc:creator: @lilg101 lilg101
item.description:
@lilg101 wrote:

Turn no-ip.duc on an just play from 127.0.01 then when mopar sever status finnaly comes back up u post your server status shownomercy.no-ip.org an they will join from their.
but as your owner you can join from local host obv becuase your hosting it… i think thats what mine is like but i can still go to my massacre.servegame.com an go in.

Read full topic
